text: The Red Hills (also called Gypsum Hills) is a physiographic area. It is mostly in Clark, Comanche and Barber counties in southern and central Kansas. This land has a lot of red rock. It does not fit the normal description of the Great Plains land of Kansas. ==References== ==Other websites== *Red Hills Focus Area-U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service *Gypsum Hills on Kansastravel.org Category:Geography of Kansas
title: Red Hills (Kansas)
